scripts.build-css: node-sass src/css/styles/flat-style/zone.scss dist/styles/flat-style/zone.css --output-style compressed && node-sass src/css/styles/flat-style-blue/zone.scss dist/styles/flat-style-blue/zone.css --output-style compressed && node-sass src/css/styles/flat-style-green/zone.scss dist/styles/flat-style-green/zone.css --output-style compressed && node-sass src/css/styles/prosilver/zone.scss dist/styles/prosilver/zone.css --output-style compressed && node-sass src/css/styles/prosilver_dark/zone.scss dist/styles/prosilver_dark/zone.css --output-style compressed
scripts.copy-dist: cp dist/nczone.js ../styles/all/theme/nczone.js && cp dist/styles/flat-style/zone.css ../styles/flat-style/theme/zone.css && cp dist/styles/flat-style-blue/zone.css ../styles/flat-style-blue/theme/zone.css && cp dist/styles/flat-style-green/zone.css ../styles/flat-style-green/theme/zone.css && cp dist/styles/prosilver/zone.css ../styles/prosilver/theme/zone.css && cp dist/styles/prosilver_dark/zone.css ../styles/prosilver_dark/theme/zone.css
